title: Towards sustainable TiO2 photoelectrodes based on cellulose nanocrystals as a processing adjuvant
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00160E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
C. Martínez-Barón, V. Calvo, J. Hernández-Ferrer, B. Villacampa, A. Ansón-Casaos, J. M. González-Domínguez, W. K. Maser, A. M. Benito
Cellulose nanocrystals, in combination with TiO2 nanoparticles, allow a greener processing of photoelectrodes with improved functionality in water splitting conditions, compared to commercial pastes.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
